Magic Notes:
Art Of Magic: +1 character level for maximum spell level
Bonus Spell Energy: +8 Spell Energy
Bonus Spells: +14 Channeler Spells
Improved Spellcasting: +10 Spell Energy/+10 Channeler Spells
Magecraft (Spiritual): Knows 3 D0 and 1 D1 spells/1 Spell Energy
Spell Knowledge: +2 Channeler Spells
Spellcasting (Conjuration): Knows 1 Channeler Conjuration spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Enchantment): Knows 1 Channeler Enchantment spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Greater Conjuration): Knows 1 Channeler Greater Conjuration spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Illusion): Knows 1 Channeler Illusion spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Transmutation): Knows 1 Channeler Transmutation spell and may learn more
Bind Astirax: R60' Binds an astirax to its current form for 10 hr; astirax is destroyed if host animal is killed (DC 16 Will neg)
Conceal Magic: Spells are considered half level for astirax detection
Counter Izrador's Will: May use Dispel Magic to counterspell legates
Craft Magic Arms And Armor: May create and mend magic weapons, armor, and shields
Craft Rune Of Power: May imbue rune w/any known spell
Craft Wondrous Item: May create and mend miscellaneous magic items
Detect Outsider: May use Detect Outsider effects at will
Heighten Spell: May cast chosen spell at a higher level
Improved Counterspell: May counterspell using a higher-level spell from the same school
Sunderborn: May use Summon Monster I, Summon Monster II, Summon Monster III, Summon Monster IV, Summon Monster V, Summon Monster VI 1/dy
Sundered Spirit: Radiates 5'-50' Antimagic Field for divine magic
Tradition Gift (Master Of Two Worlds): May control animals, plants, constructs, and/or spirits
Widen Spell: May use +3 spell slot to dbl chosen spell area of affect
Companions
Familiar: Lizard "Jucitfaim"

HD/HP: 18/49 Init: +2 AC: 18 Attack: +17 1d4-4 Fort/Ref/Will: +5/+7/+14
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: May deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Speak With Like Animals: May talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: May talk w/master in secret language
